name: test_e2e_with_logs[017_SQLI_BOOL_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BOOL_003` |
| **Name** | AND-based boolean injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | boolean_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND '1'='1`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20AND%20%271%27%3D%271`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~49000ms
- **Timestamp**: 03:13:59.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence
